replies.body: Hopefully the surprise is something good.
isn't it just 1 hextech key and box? at least, that's what i read.
It's that AND some contribution to Oceanic Animals (given the wording, it's just money going to charity.)
but which is the better reward?
i got over 50 points, do they give rewards based on that?
you get an extra Hextech chest/key for 20
Do either of them have worth?
tbh probably not really. I mean the donation to conservation is kinda cool but I mean, did we really contribute anything to it?

>I mean the donation to conservation is kinda cool but I mean, did we really contribute anything to it?

My issue is more, given riot's previous donation to charity (Cosmic Reaver Kassadin), it'll take forever to happen, and they won't tell us the amount because "privacy reasons" so that realistically, no one knows if they are bullshiting or not.
My Loot page is now empty anyone else's?
gg everyone... finished on 94 HP how about you lot?
Lol, actually all the guys that signed up did.
